PackageSubscriber.name: PackageSubscriber
PackageSubscriber.description: Represents an installation of a package in an org. This object contains installation information for managed or unlocked packages developed in the org you’re logged in to.

InstalledStatus.description: If the package is installed in the org, the value is i.

InstanceName.description: The instance that hosts the subscriber org.

MetadataPackageId.description: The package ID. Package Ids have a prefix of 033. This field is available in API version 49.0 and later.

MetadataPackageVersionId.description: The 18-character package version ID starting with 04t.

OrgKey.description: The 15-character ID that represents the Salesforce org.

OrgName.description: The name of the org where the package is installed.

OrgStatus.description: Valid values are: Active Demo Free Inactive Trial Orgs with an OrgStatus of Inactive can’t receive push upgrades.

ParentOrg.description: The production org from which a sandbox was created.
